subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The downtrodden Jets hired Maccagnan, the Texans’ director of college scouting, who possesses an extensive background in player evaluation that his predecessor, John Idzik, lacked.
snippet: The downtrodden Jets hired Maccagnan, the Texans’ director of college scouting, who possesses an extensive background in player evaluation that his predecessor, John Idzik, lacked.
